alert.note: Alert for Fresno-Tulare Lower Sierra; Grant Grove Area; Kaiser to Rodgers Ridge; Kings Canyon NP (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 3:42PM PDT by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT EAST CENTRAL FRESNO COUNTY THROUGH 415 PM PDT... At 340 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 24 miles southwest of North Lake Campground, or 24 miles southwest of South Lake, moving southwest at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. Localized heavy rainfall could lead to nuisance flooding on roadways. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Localized heavy rainfall could lead to nuisance flooding on roadways. Locations impacted include... West Woodchuck Meadow, Lake Wishon, and Wishon Dam. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Fresno-Tulare Lower Sierra; Grant Grove Area; Kaiser to Rodgers Ridge; Kings Canyon NP
